## ValidateRawConfig() function

Throws an exception if the provided raw config contains invalid data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function ValidateConfig(config: Config): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | <code>Config</code> | Raw configuration to validate. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
